title: What I Know For Sure: Connection & Gratitude
description: Oprah Winfrey shares excerpts from her New York Times Best-Selling book, What I Know For Sure which offers her insights, revelations and wisdom on how to live the life you want. In this episode, Oprah shares her greatest stories about finding true connection with others, how she practices gratitude and how she made peace with her own body struggles.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
